name: LibraryAlbums.Attributes
desc: The attributes for a library album resource.

items.name: contentRating
items.desc: The Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA) rating of the content. The possible values for this rating are clean and explicit. No value means no rating.

items.name: dateAdded
items.desc: The date the album was added to the library, in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format.

items.name: name
items.desc: The localized name of the album.

items.name: playParams
items.desc: The parameters to use to playback the tracks of the album.

items.name: releaseDate
items.desc: The release date of the album, when known, in YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY format. Pre-release albums may have an expected release date in the future.

items.name: genreNames
items.desc: The names of the genres associated with this album.
